idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 4; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.1.0.722

procstep.procdesc:
Process: Clip to study area Use 'study area' as mask Raster Calc: [ImperSur_1985] (from: \GIS\Impervious_Surface\1985) Save as: "'study area'_ImpSu_1985" In \'Study area'\Individual_grid\impervious_surface_1985\
Convert to Polygon input: "'study area'_ImpSu_1985" field: value save as: "'study area'_Impervious_1985" in \'study area'\Vector_Data\impervious_surface\conversion_from_Raster\
Intersect with ordered watersheds Input: "'study area'_Impervious_1985" Overlay: "OrderedWshed_'study area'" Save as: "'study area'_Impervious_1985_By_Wshed" In: \'study area'\Vector_Data\Impervious surface 1985\intersect with watersheds\
Calculate area of impervious surface Add fields: "SQM_Imperv" - square meters of impervious surface polygons "Acre_Imper" - Acreage of impervious surface polygons "AcxImp_Per" - "Acre_Imper" x "Gridcode" - overall area of impervious surface cover value
Dissolve based on unique id of watershed Input: "'study area' impervious_1985_by_wshed" Field: "unique id" Save as: "'study area' Impervious_1985_by_wshed_dissolve" In: \'study area'\vector data\impervious surface\dissolve by wshed unique id\ Additional fields: "AcxImp_Per" by sum "AcxImp_Per" by Average "Acre_wshed" by Minimum "Name" by first
Add attribute fields & Calculate "SQmeters" - SQ meters of overall watershed "Average" - Acreage of overall watershed "ImpP_wshed" - "Sum of Acxlmp_Per"\"Acreage" (gives average impervious surface for watershed)
Convert to grid Use 'study area'" as mask input: "'study area'_impervious_1985_by_wshed_dissolve" field: "ImpP_wshed" save as: "'study area'_ImpP_1985" in \'study area' \individual_grid\Impervious_Surface_Percent_by_wshed_1985\
Reclassify by Biological Ranks "'study area'_ImpP_1985 Save as: "'study area'_Imper_1985" in \'study area'\ranked_grids\Imperious_Surface_1985\
Old Value New Value 0-6 10 7-7 9 8-8 8 9-9 7 10-10 6 11-12 5 13-14 4 15-16 3 17-18 2 19-20 1 21-100 0

procstep.srcused: Y:\ArcGIS_Projects\Smart Conservation Documentation\Metadata\Aquatic\riparian buffer quality expanded piedmont.xml

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
